content.raw:
Interesting. Without the changes I think it returns 0 for the lengths and center. We could get 0 for the lengths by taking the greater of the current result and 0. Would that make more sense? That way the value would not change after one corner is set.

For the center, I wonder what would make most sense for an uninitialized box. In a way it is nowhere and everywhere.

Either way, documenting the expected outcomes sounds like a good idea. I can add a description as well as the DefaultConstructor test.

Thanks!
